xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika » 13.17 Saraṇaduka, Kusalattika » 13.17.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
Saraṇaduka, Kusalattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
105.
2597Araṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2598Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
106.
2599Saraṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2600Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
107.
2601Araṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2602Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārepi…pe…  sampayuttavārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
108.
2603Araṇo abyākato dhammo araṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2604Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2605(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
2606Piṭṭhidukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
